name: VALERO ENERGY CORPORATION, et al., Petitioners, v. ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY; and Valero Energy Corporation, et al., Petitioners, v. Environmental Protection Agency.
name_abbreviation: Valero Energy Corp. v. Envtl. Prot. Agency

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
VALERO ENERGY CORPORATION, et al., Petitioners,
v.
ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY; and
attorneys: Motion of National Association of Home Builders of the United States for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.
casebody.head_matter:
VALERO ENERGY CORPORATION, et al., Petitioners,
v.
ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION AGENCY; and
Valero Energy Corporation, et al., Petitioners,
v.
Environmental Protection Agency.
No. 19-835.
Supreme Court of the United States.
May 18, 2020
Motion of National Association of Home Builders of the United States for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.
